name: lib/HeapSnapshot.js
HeapSnapshot
description:
Representation for iterating over a snapshot's Nodes and Edges.
The structure of a snapshot's Node and Edge is defined within the contents of the snapshot.

properties.name: onNodeOpen
properties.description:
callback called when a Node
  is first encountered

properties.name: onEdge
properties.description:
callback called when traversing
  an Edge

properties.name: onNodeClose
properties.description:
callback called when all
  children of a Node are guaranteed to have been encountered

name: walk
description:
Helper function that performs a depth first pre order traversal of
the nodes of a HeapSnapshot. This will only visit each Node once, but
will visit all Edges of a HeapSnapshot. Since this can be a costly
operation it uses an iterator to allow chunked processing.

return.description: iterator to continue walking by calling .next

properties.name: node_index
properties.description: Index that can be used with getNode to get this Node.

properties.name: edge_index
properties.description: Index that can be used to get the first Edge of this Node.

properties.name: getEdge
properties.description: Get the specified Edge of this node.

properties.name: walkEdges
properties.description: Helper for iterating the edges of a Node.

name: getNode
description: Gets a Node by index, not by ID. The root Node is at index 0.

properties.name: edge_index
properties.description: Index that can be used with getEdge to get this Edge.

properties.name: node_index
properties.description: Index that can be used with getNode to get the owner of this Edge.

properties.name: getNode
properties.description: Helper for getting the Node this Edge points to.

name: getEdge
description: Gets an Edge by index. This should only be used in conjuction with a Node object.

params.name: edge_index
params.description: Index of the Edge we wish to get a hold of.

name: createNodeClass
description: Generates an Node class tailored for HeapSnapshot. These can vary between snapshots.

params.name: snapshot
params.description: HeapSnapshot that created this Node class

name: createEdgeClass
description: Generates an Edge class tailored for HeapSnapshot. These can vary between snapshots.

params.name: snapshot
params.description: HeapSnapshot that created this Edge class

name: lib/SplitSnapshotProvider.js
SplitSnapshotProvider
description:
An implementation of working directly with snapshot data, not meant for dev consumption.
This implementation uses Synchronous file APIs

params.name: snapshot_info
params.description: Meta information required for understanding a snapshot

name: getNodeBuffer
description: Get the buffer for a Node at the specified index

name: getEdgeBuffer
description: Get the buffer for an Edge at the specified index

name: getString
description: Gets a string at the specified index.

params.name: index
params.description: Index of the string we wish to get.

return.description: Metadata from the snapshot data required to find Node and Field structure.

name: writeToDirectory
description: Convenience method for saving snapshot data in a faster loading format to a directory

params.name: outdir
params.description: Path of the directory to save to

params.name: callback
params.description: Callback notified when there is an error or completion

name: fromDirectory
description: Convenience method for loading snapshot data from a directory

params.name: outdir
params.description: Path of the directory to load

params.name: callback
params.description: Callback notified when there is an error or completion

name: fromStream
description: Convenience method for loading snapshot data from a stream

params.name: stream
params.description: Path of the directory to load

params.name: callback
params.description: Callback notified when there is an error or completion

name: lib/bin/dump.js
lib/bin/save-to-dir.js
lib/bin/script-vars.js
lib/bin/visible-nodes.js
lib/index.js
lib/parseSnapshotStream.js
parseSnapshotStream
description: Create a writable stream for parsing JSON.
